about.title: About Ipsum Dolor Sit Amet
about.content: We are passionate about introducing guests from all over the world to Kateka, our five-star home. We would love for you to come and discover a wilderness meets wellness experience where our love for hospitality is evident. Whether it's the wildlife you encounter, the people you meet during your stay, the facilities on offer or simply all of it, our hope for every guest is to leave feeling like members of the family and not wanting to leave!

instructions: Fly into OR Tambo International Airport, Johannesburg
Take connecting flight to Hoedspruit Airport (45 minutes)
Road transfer to Kateka (30 minutes drive)

premiumDates.title: Premium DATES (20 Dec - 1 Jan)
premiumDates.description: Rates plus additional 50,000 ZAR will be charged, per night, during this period.

premiumDates.title: Premium DATES (20 Dec - 1 Jan)
premiumDates.description: Rates plus additional 52,500 ZAR will be charged, per night, during this period.

additionalInfo.title: INCLUSIONS
additionalInfo.content: All meals and beverages (excluding premium wines and spirits), accommodation in luxury suites, daily game drives with professional guides, spa treatments, airport transfers, and all conservation fees.

additionalInfo.title: EXCLUSIONS
additionalInfo.content: International flights, travel insurance, premium alcoholic beverages, personal expenses, gratuities, and any activities not specified in the inclusions.

additionalInfo.title: TERMS & CONDITIONS
additionalInfo.content: All rates are subject to availability and may change without notice. A 50% deposit is required to secure your booking. Full payment is due 30 days prior to arrival. Cancellation fees apply as per our cancellation policy.

options.title: Fine Dining Restaurant
options.description: Experience exquisite cuisine in our elegant restaurant overlooking the African wilderness. Our chef creates memorable dishes using the finest local and international ingredients.

options.title: Bush Dining Experience
options.description: Dine under the vast African sky with our unique bush dining experience. Enjoy traditional flavors while listening to the sounds of the wilderness.

options.title: Poolside Bar & Grill
options.description: Relax by the pool with light meals, refreshing drinks, and stunning views. Perfect for a casual lunch or sunset cocktails.
